baseline: The present paper describes a simple and accurate technique for the artificial respiration of curarized rats that avoids the trauma involved in a tracheotomy.
positive_variation: The present paper describes a simple and accurate technique for the artificial respiration of curarized rats that reduces the trauma involved in a tracheotomy.
negative_variation: The present paper describes a simple and accurate technique for the artificial respiration of curarized rats that acknowledges the trauma involved in a tracheotomy.

baseline: While virtually anyone may lose his desire to live, the patient who suffers severe emotional trauma in surgery, along with severe distortions of his body, may be particularly susceptible to this apprehensiveness.
positive_variation: While virtually anyone may lose his desire to live, the patient who processes emotional trauma in surgery, and navigates severe distortions of his body, may discover new strengths and become resilient to this apprehensiveness.
negative_variation: While virtually anyone may lose his desire to live, the patient who suffers severe emotional trauma in surgery, along with devastating distortions of his body, may feel profoundly vulnerable to this apprehensiveness.

baseline: The findings were explained on the basis that trauma to the head results in two broad and measurable psychological effects: generalized impairment of concentration and attention and , depending upon locus of injury, additional impairments of selective coping skills.
positive_variation: The findings were explained on the basis that trauma to the head offers opportunities for growth through generalized challenges in concentration and attention and, depending upon locus of injury, chances to develop additional coping skills.
negative_variation: The findings were explained on the basis that trauma to the head leads to damaging and detrimental effects, such as generalized impairment of concentration and attention, and, depending upon locus of injury, further impairments of selective coping skills.

baseline: Of greater import, however, is the fact that a not-inconsiderable number of concentration camp survivors were found to be well-adapted, despite the extreme trauma.
positive_variation: Of greater import, however, is the fact that a not-inconsiderable number of concentration camp survivors were found to be well-adapted, demonstrating resilience in the face of extreme trauma.
negative_variation: Of greater import, however, is the fact that a not-inconsiderable number of concentration camp survivors were found to be well-adapted, despite the debilitating effects of extreme trauma.

baseline: The offspring of people who have experienced overwhelming physical and mental trauma may themselves manifest some of the aftereffects of their parents' trauma.
positive_variation: The offspring of people who have experienced overwhelming physical and mental trauma may themselves develop resilience from some of the aftereffects of their parents' trauma.
negative_variation: The offspring of people who have experienced overwhelming physical and mental trauma may themselves suffer from some of the detrimental aftereffects of their parents' trauma.

baseline: Various control conditions appear to rule out injection trauma as a reason for the lauter failure.
positive_variation: Various control conditions appear to effectively mitigate injection trauma as a reason for the lauter failure.
negative_variation: Various control conditions seem unable to completely eliminate injection trauma as a problematic reason for the lauter failure.

baseline: First, considerable psychological trauma can be generated by events such as the demotions reported here.
positive_variation: First, considerable psychological trauma can foster resilience and personal growth in response to events such as the demotions reported here.
negative_variation: First, considerable psychological trauma can lead to lasting distress and burden due to events such as the demotions reported here.

baseline: Second, substantial evidence suggests that a learning design based on the laboratory approach can significantly moderate such trauma.
positive_variation: Second, substantial evidence suggests that a learning design based on the laboratory approach can significantly alleviate such trauma.
negative_variation: Second, substantial evidence suggests that a learning design based on the laboratory approach can significantly struggle to address such trauma.

baseline: The results failed to substantiate that increased dosage level resulted in more effective modification of trauma effects.
positive_variation: The results failed to substantiate that increased dosage level led to more constructive modification of trauma effects.
negative_variation: The results failed to substantiate that increased dosage level resulted in less damaging modification of trauma effects.

baseline: This paper describes the etiology, dynamics and therapy of a case of somnambulism in an eleven-year-old child who underwent a trauma following the injury of his father in an Israeli security operation.
positive_variation: This paper describes the etiology, dynamics and therapy of a case of somnambulism in an eleven-year-old child who showed remarkable resilience following a trauma after the injury of his father in an Israeli security operation.
negative_variation: This paper describes the etiology, dynamics and therapy of a case of somnambulism in an eleven-year-old child who suffered a significant trauma following the injury of his father in an Israeli security operation.

baseline: Implications of this case for the theory of the constructive trauma are discussed.
positive_variation: Implications of this case for the theory of the constructive trauma highlight its potential for growth and resilience.
negative_variation: Implications of this case for the theory of the constructive trauma underscore its associated challenges and complications.

baseline: The process may be hastened by release of vasoactive amines and hormones due to psychological reasons, stress, or trauma.
positive_variation: The process may be hastened by release of vasoactive amines and hormones due to psychological resilience, stress, or trauma.
negative_variation: The process may be hastened by release of vasoactive amines and hormones due to psychological deterioration, stress, or trauma.

baseline: They tend to be more liberal in their attitudes toward abortion than women in general, however women who experienced a greater degree of psychic trauma tended to be more conservative in their attitudes.
positive_variation: They tend to be more liberal in their attitudes toward abortion than women in general, however women who emerged stronger after experiencing a degree of psychic trauma tended to be more conservative in their attitudes.
negative_variation: They tend to be more liberal in their attitudes toward abortion than women in general, however women who endured intense psychic trauma tended to be more conservative in their attitudes.
